title: 12-day Fly & Tour: Very Vietnam
inclusions_evidence: Economy class flights from Auckland to Vietnam with Singapore Airlines
2 nights accommodation 1 night at the Movenpick Hotel Hanoi Centre, and 1 night at the Novotel Saigon Centre
10-day small group trip with On the Go Tours from Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh City, twin share
Meals: Breakfast daily, 4 lunches and 1 dinner

flights.assumed_route: Auckland to Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City to Auckland

hotel.name_or_hint: Movenpick Hotel Hanoi Centre and Novotel Saigon Centre

other.notes: Additional costs for meals and optional tours.

reasoning: The package includes flights, accommodation, meals, and guided tours, which collectively provide significant savings compared to booking each component separately.
